question: India held the fifth meeting of Bilateral High-Level Group on Trade, Investment and Cooperation, with which country?
explanation:
India and Mexico attended the fifth meeting of the India-Mexico Bilateral High-Level Group on Trade, Investment and Cooperation (BHLG).
The meeting was held in virtual mode and two MoUs were signed between Electronics & Computer Software Export Promotion Council (ESC) of India and FICCI with their respective counterparts.
